title: China Economists Urge Looser Capital Controls as Dollar Dips
description: Several prominent Chinese economists have called for loosening restrictions on the movement of money in and out of the country, arguing that a weaker dollar provides a historic opportunity to boost the yuan’s global appeal by increasing its convertibility.
